solution_line_template: Casey wants to paint her {toenails} toenails + {fingernails} fingernails = <<{toenails}+{fingernails}={total_nails}>>{total_nails} nails in total.

First she wants to do a base coat which takes {time_apply_coat} minutes to apply + {time_dry_coat} minutes to dry = <<{time_apply_coat}+{time_dry_coat}={time_per_coat}>>{time_per_coat} minutes total for the first coat.

It will take the same amount of time to do a coat of paint and let it dry and to do a coat of glitter and let it dry, {time_per_coat} minutes x {num_coats} different coats = <<{time_per_coat}*{num_coats}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes total to paint her toenails and fingernails.
